vibes.slurm
===

Heavily inspired by [sirmarcels](https://gitlab.com/sirmarcel) [jobro](https://gitlab.com/sirmarcel/jobro) project.

Maybe we join forces one day :fist:

```
args = (
    "name",
    "logfile",
    "mail_type",
    "mail_address",
    "nodes",
    "cores",
    "timeout",
    "queue",
    "command",
    "tag",
)
```
